comments:
I-I20050203-200502032139

Using a fresh install (no configuration at all):
1. Open an SQL editor
2. Press either "select Connection" or "Execute SQL" buttons on the toolbar
3. Observe the action will do nothing and a NPE will appear in the log
4. Open the DB connections view
5. Open the new connection wizard
6. Close the wizard
7. Press the "select Connection" action in the SQL editor
8. Observe it now shows up with no connections

Run SQL and Select Connection icons have been removed from the toolbar.  Refer 
to bug #101388.
